content: In the project's issues there is an issue about translated errors. Manish suggested that some day we could have a special error type which would allow for external libraries to instrument the errors to be translatable by their users. What are your thoughts on this?
and also I did not know about the internationalization of the compiler he mentioned

Pretty much aligned with Manish, I asked him about internationalization so I could better understand the issue since he's an expert on it and he wrote up a summary comment of his suggestion in our conversation.
